From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin interrogāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [in.tə.ruˈɣa]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [in.tə.roˈɣa]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [in.te.roˈɣaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

interrogar (first-person singular present interrogo, first-person singular preterite interroguí, past participle interrogat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /ɔ/

  1. (transitive) to interrogate

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of interrogar (first conjugation, g-gu alternation)
infinitive interrogar
gerund interrogant
past participle masculine feminine
singular interrogat interrogada
plural interrogats interrogades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present interrogo interrogues interroga interroguem interrogueu interroguen
imperfect interrogava interrogaves interrogava interrogàvem interrogàveu interrogaven
future interrogaré interrogaràs interrogarà interrogarem interrogareu interrogaran
preterite interroguí interrogares interrogà interrogàrem interrogàreu interrogaren
conditional interrogaria interrogaries interrogaria interrogaríem interrogaríeu interrogarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present interrogui interroguis interrogui interroguem interrogueu interroguin
imperfect interrogués interroguessis interrogués interroguéssim interroguéssiu interroguessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — interroga interrogui interroguem interrogueu interroguin
negative (no) — no interroguis no interrogui no interroguem no interrogueu no interroguin

Related terms

[edit]
  • interrogació
  • interrogatiu
  • interrogatori

Further reading

[edit]
  • “interrogar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007

Occitan

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • interrojar (Limousin)

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

interrogar (Languedoc)

  1. (transitive) to interrogate

Related terms

[edit]
  • interrogacion
  • interrogatiu
  • interrogator
  • interrogatòri

Further reading

[edit]
  • Diccionari General de la Lenga Occitana‎[1], L’Academia occitana – Consistòri del Gai Saber, 2008-2025, page 322

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin interrogāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.te.ʁoˈɡa(ʁ)/ [ĩ.te.hoˈɡa(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.te.ʁoˈɡa(ʁ)/ [ĩ.te.hoˈɡa(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /ĩ.te.ʁoˈɡa(ɾ)/ [ĩ.te.hoˈɡa(ɾ)]
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /ĩ.te.ʁoˈɡa(ʁ)/ [ĩ.te.χoˈɡa(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.te.ʁoˈɡa(ɻ)/ [ĩ.te.hoˈɡa(ɻ)]
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.tɨ.ʁuˈɡaɾ/ [ĩ.tɨ.ʁuˈɣaɾ]
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.tɨ.ʁuˈɡaɾ/ [ĩ.tɨ.ʁuˈɣaɾ]
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.tɨ.ʁuˈɡa.ɾi/ [ĩ.tɨ.ʁuˈɣa.ɾi]

Verb

[edit]

interrogar (first-person singular present interrogo, first-person singular preterite interroguei, past participle interrogado)

  1. (transitive) to interrogate

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of interrogar (g-gu alternation) (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)

(tu) 		Third-person

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin interrogāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /interoˈɡaɾ/ [ĩn̪.t̪e.roˈɣ̞aɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: in‧te‧rro‧gar

Verb

[edit]

interrogar (first-person singular present interrogo, first-person singular preterite interrogué, past participle interrogado)

  1. (transitive) to interrogate

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of interrogar (g-gu alternation) (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive interrogar
gerund interrogando
past participle masculine feminine
singular interrogado interrogada
plural interrogados interrogadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present interrogo interrogastú
interrogásvos 		interroga interrogamos interrogáis interrogan
imperfect interrogaba interrogabas interrogaba interrogábamos interrogabais interrogaban
preterite interrogué interrogaste interrogó interrogamos interrogasteis interrogaron
future interrogaré interrogarás interrogará interrogaremos interrogaréis interrogarán
conditional interrogaría interrogarías interrogaría interrogaríamos interrogaríais interrogarían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present interrogue interroguestú
interroguésvos2 		interrogue interroguemos interroguéis interroguen
imperfect
(ra) 		interrogara interrogaras interrogara interrogáramos interrogarais interrogaran
imperfect
(se) 		interrogase interrogases interrogase interrogásemos interrogaseis interrogasen
future1 interrogare interrogares interrogare interrogáremos interrogareis interrogaren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative interrogatú
interrogávos 		interrogue interroguemos interrogad interroguen
negative no interrogues no interrogue no interroguemos no interroguéis no interroguen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

accusative interrogadme not used interrogadlo, interrogadla interrogadnos interrogaos interrogadlos, interrogadlas

accusative interróguenme not used interróguenlo, interróguenla interróguennos not used interróguenlos, interróguenlas, interróguense
